title: Emily Batty’s Signature Edition Canyon Lux Trail is a true Pro Model
content:
Canyon just launched their newest bike, the Lux Trail ‘downcountry’ rig. With four different models to choose from, it’s the top end model that really stands out—though not just for the usual reasons. In an interesting twist, Canyon has devoted their top model as the EB-Edition. That EB of course stands for women’s MTB star,

The post Emily Batty’s Signature Edition Canyon Lux Trail is a true Pro Model appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
